name: CFStreamStatus
desc: Constants that describe the status of a stream.

items.name: case notOpen
items.desc: The stream is not open for reading or writing.

items.name: case opening
items.desc: The stream is being opened for reading or for writing.

items.name: case reading
items.desc: The stream is being read from.

items.name: case writing
items.desc: The stream is being written to.

items.name: case atEnd
items.desc: There is no more data to read, or no more data can be written.

items.name: case error
items.desc: An error occurred on the stream.
